src:
NAMEREG sA, cc
NAMEREG sB, tmp

; Init
CALL initLCD
LOAD s1, 1

s:
LOAD s0, 0
loop:
CALL@ (s1, s0)
COMPARE cc, 0
JUMP Z, itest
OUTPUT cc, 6
ADD s0, 1
JUMP loop


itest:
LOAD s0, 0
ADD s1, 1
COMPARE s1, 3
JUMP Z, end
LOAD cc, C0
OUTPUT cc, 5
JUMP loop


end: JUMP end


initLCD:
LOAD tmp, 3C
OUTPUT tmp, 5
LOAD tmp, 0F
OUTPUT tmp, 5
LOAD tmp, 01
OUTPUT tmp, 5
RETURN


ADDRESS 100
LOAD&RETURN cc, 'H'
LOAD&RETURN cc, 'e'
LOAD&RETURN cc, 'l'
LOAD&RETURN cc, 'l'
LOAD&RETURN cc, 'o'
LOAD&RETURN cc, ' '
LOAD&RETURN cc, 'W'
LOAD&RETURN cc, 'o'
LOAD&RETURN cc, 'r'
LOAD&RETURN cc, 'l'
LOAD&RETURN cc, 'd'
LOAD&RETURN cc, '!'
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0

ADDRESS 200
LOAD&RETURN cc, ' '
LOAD&RETURN cc, ' '
LOAD&RETURN cc, ' '
LOAD&RETURN cc, ' '
LOAD&RETURN cc, ' '
LOAD&RETURN cc, BA
LOAD&RETURN cc, DD
LOAD&RETURN cc, C6
LOAD&RETURN cc, C1
LOAD&RETURN cc, CA
LOAD&RETURN cc, BE
LOAD&RETURN cc, B6
LOAD&RETURN cc, B2
LOAD&RETURN cc, '!'
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0
